SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

org.gatein.api.portal.navigation
Interface Node

All Superinterfaces:
Displayable, Iterable<Node>, Serializable
public interface Node
extends Displayable, Iterable<Node>, Serializable

A node object which represents the current state of a node retrieved from the portal. All changes to the node are not saved until Navigation.saveNode(Node) is called.

Author:
Nick Scavelli

Returns the visibility object of this navigation node. This should never be null.

                   throws IllegalArgumentException

Parameters:

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the publication date is null

setVisibility

void setVisibility(boolean visible)
Sets the visibility of this navigation node either Visibility.Flag.VISIBLE or Visibility.Flag.HIDDEN. This does not remove any publication information, just sets the flag.

Parameters:
visible - if this node should be visible or not

setVisibility

void setVisibility(PublicationDate publicationDate)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
Sets the visibility of this navigation node to be Visibility.Flag.PUBLICATION, in which the dates of the PublicationDate are used to calculate the visibility.

Parameters:
publicationDate - the publication date
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if the publication date is null

Node addChild(String childName)
              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                     IllegalStateException,
                     EntityAlreadyExistsException
Adds a child to this navigation node.

Parameters:
childName - the name of the child
Returns:
the newly created child node
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if childName is null
IllegalStateException - if this node's children have not been loaded.
EntityAlreadyExistsException - if a child of the same name already exists.

              String childName)

Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if childName is null
IllegalStateException - if this node's children have not been loaded.
IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range
EntityAlreadyExistsException - if a child of the same name already exists.

isChildrenLoaded

boolean isChildrenLoaded()
If this node's children has been loaded. This should be called prior to calling any child methods on this node.

Returns:
true if the children have been loaded, false otherwise

getNode

Node getNode(String... nodePath)
             throws IllegalArgumentException,
                    IllegalStateException
Returns the node specified by the node path, relative to this node.

For example: if the current tree is /foo/bar/baz and the current node is foo, then calling foo.getNode("bar", "baz") would return the baz node.

Parameters:
nodePath - the node path relative to this node.
Returns:
the node
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if nodePath is null
IllegalStateException - if any of the nodes represented by the path do not have their children loaded

getNode

Node getNode(NodePath nodePath)
             throws IllegalArgumentException,
                    IllegalStateException
Returns the node specified by the node path, relative to this node.

For example: if the current tree is /foo/bar/baz and the current node is foo, then calling foo.getNode(NodePath.path("bar", "baz")) would return the baz node.

Parameters:
nodePath - the node path relative to this node
Returns:
the node
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if nodePath is null
IllegalStateException - if any of the nodes represented by the path do not have their children loaded

indexOf

int indexOf(String childName)
            throws IllegalArgumentException
The index of the child with the specified name.

Parameters:
childName - the name of the child
Returns:
the index of the child or -1 if the child does not exist.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if childName is null
IllegalStateException - if this node's children have not been loaded

removeChild

boolean removeChild(String childName)
                    throws IllegalArgumentException
Removes the child from this navigation node.

Parameters:
childName - the name of the child
Returns:
true if the child was removed, false otherwise
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if childName was null
IllegalStateException - if this node's children have not been loaded

filter

Node filter(Filter<Node> filter)
            throws IllegalArgumentException
Will return a filtered view of this navigation node. All child operations consider the filter.

For example if a node has 3 visible and one hidden children nodes and a filter is applied to only accept visible nodes, getChildrenCount would only return 2, iterating over the filtered node would not include the hidden node, etc.

Parameters:
filter - the filter to apply to this node
Returns:
a filtered node
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if filter is null

sort

void sort(Comparator<Node> comparator)
          throws IllegalArgumentException
Will sort the children of this node per the comparator.

Parameters:
comparator - the comparator responsible for comparing nodes for sorting.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if comparator is null

moveTo

void moveTo(int index)
            throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
Moves the node to the specified index. param index the index to move the node to.

Throws:
IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range

moveTo

void moveTo(Node parent)
            throws IllegalArgumentException,
                   EntityAlreadyExistsException
Moves this node to another parent.

Parameters:
parent - the parent to move this node to.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if parent is on a different branch, is a child of the current node, or if it is null
EntityAlreadyExistsException - if a node with the same name already exists at the parent location
IllegalStateException - if the children of the parent to move to have not been loaded

moveTo

void moveTo(int index,
            Node parent)
            throws IndexOutOfBoundsException,
                   IllegalArgumentException,
                   EntityAlreadyExistsException
Moves this node to another parent inserting it at the specified index.

Parameters:
index - the index to be inserted at
parent - the parent to move this node to
Throws:
IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range
IllegalArgumentException - if parent is null
EntityAlreadyExistsException - if a node with the same name already exists at the parent location
IllegalStateException - if the children of the parent to move to have not been loaded
